name: SUSHI SOUL UNIVERSE
description:
"Sushi! It's so delicious! You should think about it!"

If you don't keep eating sushi, you'll die... This is the great adventure of a man who loves sushi too much!
In order to thwart an evil ambition that plans to rewrite the concept of sushi, let's take on the great sushi test that transcends the boundaries of space!

“Sushi is food!”

Conquer over 60 different 3D courses with jumping action and a love for sushi!
Simple but profound! It's a multiverse stylish sushi eating action game!

Game features:
  • Collect "Sushi Soul" obtained by clearing the courses!
  • There are many scenario cutscenes. The story depicts the fierce battle between those who love sushi and those who hate it.
  • STEAM scoreboard compatible. Compete in a time attack with sushi lovers from all over the world!
  • It doesn't matter if you haven't played the previous game.
  • There are several types of "skills" that enhance the main character's actions, increasing the degree of freedom in game strategy.
